name: Excel 2016 Essentials
subtitle: Spreadsheet application
description: Excel 2016 is the powerful spreadsheet application in the Office suite. It seems every organization. large and small, uses Excel to organize and analyze data. However, many users are intimidated by Excel and confused by how it behaves as an application.  This Excel 2016 Essentials series strives to empower users by learning the foundations to conquer the program. We begin with basic skills such as navigating the interface, identifying items in a spreadsheet, selecting cells, and inputting data. The series also covers formatting text and numbers, modifying a worksheet layout, printing and page layout, and managing worksheets in a workbook. While this series is designed for beginner users, it has lots of great tips and tricks for experienced users as well.

episodes.title: Overview
episodes.description: Excel 2016 is the powerful spreadsheet application in the Office suite. It seems every organization. large and small, uses Excel to organize and analyze data. However, many users are intimidated by Excel and confused by how it behaves as an application. This Excel 2016 Essentials series strives to empower users by learning the foundations to conquer the program. We begin with basic skills such as navigating the interface, identifying items in a spreadsheet, selecting cells, and inputting data. The series also covers formatting text and numbers, modifying a worksheet layout, printing and page layout, and managing worksheets in a workbook. While this series is designed for beginner users, it has lots of great tips and tricks for experienced users as well.

episodes.title: Introduction to Excel
episodes.description: In this episode, Daniel and Vonne kick off the Microsoft Excel 2016 Essentials series. Here they start at the beginning by exploring what Excel 2016 is and what it's used for as well as the foundational terms and concepts that are apart of the Excel vocabulary.

episodes.title: Excel Basics
episodes.description: In this episode, Daniel and Vonne go over the basics of working with Excel in Windows operating system. Here they cover foundational skills like starting Excel, the title bar, minimize/maximize/restore/close, opening a new file, opening an existing file, save vs. save as, and keyboard shortcuts.

episodes.title: Excel Interface
episodes.description: In this episode, Daniel and Vonne go over the basics of the Excel User Interface or UI. Here you will learn about the title bar, the ribbon, quick access toolbar, formula bar, name box, status bar, and help.

episodes.title: Navigate a Workbook
episodes.description: In this episode, Daniel and Vonne show you the ins and outs of the Excel 2016 Workbook. Here they will explain the different mouse cursors, active cells, scrolling, keyboard navigation, navigating with the Name box, zooming, and switching worksheets.

episodes.title: Select Cells
episodes.description: In this episode, Daniel and Vonne explore the multiple ways that you can select and work with cells in Microsoft Excel 2016. Here they look at the different mouse cursors, click/hold/drag, deselecting, range selecting, select with Shift and arrow keys, select all, select multiple worksheets, select text in multiple worksheets, named ranges, and Find & Select.

episodes.title: Insert Data
episodes.description: In this episode, Daniel and Vonne explore the variety of ways that you can insert data into your Excel worksheet. Here they cover: entering data into a cell, editing data in a cell, data and cell overflow, autocorrect options, move data to new cell, copy/paste, and clear cell data.

episodes.title: Fill Series and Flash Fill
episodes.description: In this episode, Daniel and Vonne explore how to use the Fill with Series and Flash Fill functions of Microsoft Excel 2016. These features expand the way you perform copy and pastes and will predict ranges like dates and common item lists.

episodes.title: Export and File Types
episodes.description: In this episode, Daniel and Vonne go through the common filetypes supported by Excel 2016. Here they explain .xlsx files, Comma Separated Value(.csv) files, OpenDocument Spreadsheet(.ods) files, and Excel Templates(.xltx) files.

episodes.title: Modify a Worksheet
episodes.description: In this episode, Daniel and Vonne explore modifying a Worksheet in Excel 2016. Here they demonstrate how to select columns and rows, changing column height and row width, inserting/deleting rows/columns, hiding columns and rows, word wrap, and cell merges.

episodes.title: Format a Worksheet
episodes.description: In this episode, Daniel and Vonne explain formatting a Worksheet in Excel 2016. Here they talk about modifying fonts, adding borders and shading, copying formats, aligning data in cells, and adding styles and themes.

episodes.title: Format a Worksheet Part 2
episodes.description: In this episode, Daniel and Vonne explain formatting a Worksheet in Excel 2016. Here they talk about modifying fonts, adding borders and shading, copying formats, aligning data in cells, and adding styles and themes.

episodes.title: Number Formats
episodes.description: Vonne and Zach discuss what Number Formatting is, automatic formatting when inserting data, what is Scientific, currency vs. accounting, number sign vs. 0, and percentages.

episodes.title: Number Formats Part 2
episodes.description: Vonne and Zach conclude the discussion on Number Formats in Excel, how to insert Dates, Date as number table, variations on including Time, and special and custom use.

episodes.title: Proof, Print and Page Layout
episodes.description: Vonne and Zach cover Proofing, spellcheck, add & ignore functions, using the Thesaurus, smart lookup, print review, settings and page setup dialog box, orientation, headers & footers, margins, scaling, vertical & horizontal settings, zoom, and changing margins.

episodes.title: Proof, Print and Page Layout Part 2
episodes.description: Vonne and Zach conclude the discussion on Proof, Print & Page Layout, options for page layout, page setup dialog box, viewing the page like Word, background image, print gridlines, headings, print titles, print area, and page breaks.

episodes.title: Manage Sheets and Workbooks
episodes.description: In this episode, Daniel and Vonne finish up the Excel 2016 Essentials series by demonstrating how to manage Workbooks and worksheets. Here they show you how to rename tabs, change tab color, rearrange tabs, create new/delete worksheets, copy/hide/move worksheets, freeze panes, split view, new windows, and arranging windows.
